    • convertLiteral

      public RexNode convertLiteral(SqlRexContext cx, SqlLiteral literal)
      Description copied from interface: SqlNodeToRexConverter
      Converts a SQL literal to a REX literal.

      The result is RexNode, not RexLiteral because if the literal is NULL (or the boolean Unknown value), we make a CAST(NULL AS type) expression.

      Specified by:
      convertLiteral in interface SqlNodeToRexConverter
